en.hero_tagline: Discover Your Complete Leadership Profile & Transform Your Team
en.hero_subtitle: Free, science-backed assessments combining work style, leadership approach, and team dynamics. Get instant insights in minutes.
en.worker_subtitle: Discover if you're a Sprinter, Jogger, or Ultrarunner. Understand your natural work rhythm and optimize your performance in just 5 minutes.
en.mental_subtitle: Understand Your complete well-being profile in 5 minutes
en.intro_paragraph: This assessment identifies your primary leadership style based on how you naturally approach challenges, collaborate with teams, and drive results.
en.team_subtitle: A structured assessment to surface team strengths, roles, and collaboration (approx. 7 minutes).

team.q1: Team members openly admit their mistakes and weaknesses
team.q2: People ask for help without hesitation
team.q3: Team members give each other benefit of the doubt
team.q4: People apologize quickly and genuinely when they mess up
team.q5: Team meetings include passionate, unfiltered debate
team.q6: People voice disagreements during meetings (not after)
team.q7: Conflicts get resolved quickly and cleanly
team.q8: Team members challenge each other's ideas respectfully
team.q9: Decisions are made with clarity and buy-in from everyone
team.q10: Team members leave meetings confident about direction
team.q11: People stick to decisions even when they initially disagreed
team.q12: Deadlines and priorities are crystal clear to everyone
team.q13: Team members call each other out on performance issues
team.q14: People take ownership when things go wrong
team.q15: Standards are upheld even when it's uncomfortable
team.q16: Team members pressure peers to deliver on commitments
team.q17: Team celebrates collective wins over individual achievements
team.q18: People sacrifice personal agendas for team goals
team.q19: Success metrics are clearly defined and tracked
team.q20: Team members are genuinely concerned about letting teammates down

en.cta_paragraph: Discover how to build balanced teams with the right mix of Sprinters, Joggers, and Ultrarunners.
